channel.title: Future development of RSPS
channel.description: When will RSPS start having C coded with them? Jagex already passed using Java only, and they use three different languages ontop of it, so when will RSPS start to implant other languages. - this is the only way I can see a RS remake getting REALLY far.

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

Everyone wanting to play an official server should just make their own it will be faster.

The problem is making it actually good.

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Irrelevant, it will happen when it happens. There is no timeframe, and right now it’s not clear about who will actually ‘own’ the ‘official’ server.

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:32, topic:412002”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=513259.msg3728995#msg3728995 date=1314484903]
We were suppose to have an official server of Moparscape but I don’t know what happened to that development.
[/quote]
Mopar has already paid blakeman8192 and boomer159 for submitting Osiris months ago. It’s just a matter of time before we actually have an official RS2 server.[/quote]
And how long has this been since those two were paid?

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:32, topic:412002”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=513259.msg3728995#msg3728995 date=1314484903]
We were suppose to have an official server of Moparscape but I don’t know what happened to that development.
[/quote]
Mopar has already paid blakeman8192 and boomer159 for submitting Osiris months ago. It’s just a matter of time before we actually have an official RS2 server.[/quote]
Well I’ve been sick the past 3 weeks not even being able to leave a hospital bed. >> Someone should have told me there was a server upcoming for moparscape, I could have had half of one coded from scratch by now.

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

We were suppose to have an official server of Moparscape but I don’t know what happened to that development.

Mopar has already paid blakeman8192 and boomer159 boomer216 for submitting Osiris months ago. It’s just a matter of time before we actually have an official RS2 server.

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:30, topic:412002”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=513259.msg3728990#msg3728990 date=1314484717]

I don’t see what you all mean by pulling ourselves together… I mean, I get that everyones all pissed about all of the dspk’s going around, but still, what would make you think we “pulled ourselves together”? No more PIs?

No, if we even bothered to take the time and come together and make an official server for Moparscape or something, we would have a decent server, I’m sure.

Yeah I think that would be a neat idea, each member willing too could contribute bits of coding here and there.

I vote for this.
[/quote]
We were suppose to have an official server of Moparscape but I don’t know what happened to that development.[/quote]

Was about to mention that, I don’t know what happened to it to be completely honest with you. Ill have a flick though the forum to see where it has gone to.

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:29, topic:412002”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=513259.msg3728435#msg3728435 date=1314461892]

I don’t see what you all mean by pulling ourselves together… I mean, I get that everyones all pissed about all of the dspk’s going around, but still, what would make you think we “pulled ourselves together”? No more PIs?

No, if we even bothered to take the time and come together and make an official server for Moparscape or something, we would have a decent server, I’m sure.

Yeah I think that would be a neat idea, each member willing too could contribute bits of coding here and there.
[/quote]

I vote for this.[/quote]
We were suppose to have an official server of Moparscape but I don’t know what happened to that development.

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:17, topic:412002”]C++ Server - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,218763.0.html
Ruby Server (Not 100% sure if it is all ruby) - https://github.com/parabolika/rubyserv
OSGI Server (Handles Ruby scripts) - https://github.com/parabolika/osgi-server

There have been many other sources that supported script usage also.[/quote]

RuneEmu will never be finished, god damn.

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

C++ Server - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,218763.0.html
Ruby Server (Not 100% sure if it is all ruby) - https://github.com/parabolika/rubyserv
OSGI Server (Handles Ruby scripts) - https://github.com/parabolika/osgi-server

There have been many other sources that supported script usage also.

Read full topic

item.title: Future development of RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

LilXCj:

Basically, he wants us to fuck ourselves because RSPS is going nowhere.

Well thats a little exaggerated, what I’m saying is RSPS’s had their glory day, and unless everyone pulls together to flip it around it’s not going to ever reach that level again.

Read full topic
